rows.label: qev041307_MSG0002
rows.name: Cards are flimsy and inedible. It makes no sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0003
rows.name:
My husband is weak. Spends all day seeking
Miralife Cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0004
rows.name:
He spent all our money on them. It made me angry.
So I took his cards away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0005
rows.name:
He whined like child. Said he could not lose rare
"silver simius." Pah. If Prone collect things,
it should be meat and bones![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0006
rows.name:
Have you eaten roast beef, Earth alien?
It is served at diner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0007
rows.name:
I want to eat it. But I cannot. Foolish husband spent
our money on Miralife Cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0008
rows.name:
All I have now is silver simius card. Worthless.
I would gladly trade it for proper meal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Hmm? Of course I will trade! Ha ha!
I should express wishes more often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0010
rows.name:
Husband's cards were useful after all.
I will have to tell him. Though he will just weep
and whine like child.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0011
rows.name: Bah. Enough. I hope you enjoy card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0013
rows.name:
You have suid bones! So white and strong!
Very impressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0014
rows.name:
I wish my husband collected such bones. But no.
He only cares for Miralife Cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0015
rows.name:
Hmm... I took "silver simius card" from him.
Would you trade it for bones?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0016
rows.name:
...Truly? Looks like it pays to ask.
I should express wishes more often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0017
rows.name:
Husband's cards were useful after all.
I will have to tell him. Though he will just weep
and whine like child.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0018
rows.name: Bah. Enough. I hope you enjoy card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041307_MSG0019
rows.name:
I see. It was too much to hope for.
I will take no more time from you.[ST:wait ]
